hero.title: Welcome to
hero.subtitle: the AI-powered design studio that generates hyper-realistic images of your creations on any model you can imagine. No cameras, no studios, no limits.

aiModels.title: AI-Powered Models
aiModels.description: Choose from diverse AI models and see realistic try-on results with advanced computer vision.

instantResults.title: Instant Results
instantResults.description: Get immediate visual feedback on how clothes look and fit without waiting or downloading anything.

multipleCategories.title: Multiple Categories
multipleCategories.description: Try on tops, bottoms, dresses, and complete outfits across different clothing categories.

step1.title: Choose Your Model
step1.description: Select from our diverse collection of AI models or upload your own photo.

step2.title: Browse Clothing
step2.description: Explore our catalog of clothing items organized by categories and styles.

step3.title: Virtual Try-On
step3.description: See instant results as our AI overlays the clothing on your selected model.

step4.title: Save & Share
step4.description: Save your favorite looks and share them with friends or on social media.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Shopping Experience?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who are already using Vtryon to make better fashion choices.

footer.tagline: The future of virtual fashion technology.
